Check your posture right now

Chances are, you're slouching. Why should you care? Having bad posture causes spinal wear and tear, feelings of depression, and a higher chance of back injury. Your back suffers when you slouch:

Having poor posture can result in your spine carrying an additional 20-60 pounds!
- The Washington Post (Image via Dr. Erik Dalton, PhD)

Still don’t care? What if you could look more attractive (taller, thinner, more confident), feel happier, and boost your self-esteem? Well, you can, by having good posture:

Harvard Medical School and many other medical institutions praise the health benefits of good posture. And, with Backbone, you can enjoy all the health benefits with much less effort.

Look and feel your strongest with Backbone

Backbone is the world's smartest posture support and is approved and recommended by health professionals. Here's why:

Advanced technical fabrics and materials woven to form a posture support brace that's sleek enough to be worn under your clothes, and provide you with maximum comfort, breathability, and support.

State-of-the-art six-axis motion sensors accurately monitor your posture and notify you through the use of vibration motors and smartphone notifications whenever you slouch or need to take a sitting break.

Continuously updated Android/iOS smartphone app delivers premium training and educational content, visualizes your progress, alerts when you've been sitting for too long, and so much more.

Compatible with Android and Apple devices supporting Bluetooth 4.0 and above.
